name: trgtps

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c0, ctgp))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ TopRing, c0 ∈ TopSp, c0 ∈ TopGrp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, ctgp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, ctps))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ TopGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c0 ∈ TopSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, ctgp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, ctps))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ TopGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c0 ∈ TopSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, ctps))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c0 ∈ TopSp)

comment: A topological ring is a topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
